abstract: The middleman, Kenneth T. Robinson, who has agreed to cooperate with the government’s case, pleaded guilty to securities fraud.
snippet: The middleman, Kenneth T. Robinson, who has agreed to cooperate with the government’s case, pleaded guilty to securities fraud.
lead_paragraph: Craig Ruttle/Bloomberg NewsKenneth T. Robinson leaving federal court in Newark on Monday.

headline.main: Middleman in Insider Trading Triangle Says There Was Once a Fourth
